DOC.brief_summary: This study seek determine public health impact provide rapid HIV test kit men sex men ( MSM ) may test convenience . The study determine men receive rapid HIV test kit report HIV test least three time per year . This study conduct four consecutive part . The first three part formative nature guide development implementation Part 4 study . The research study use two different type rapid HIV test . The OraQuick速 In-Home HIV Test oral fluid ( FDA approve home use ) Sure Check速 HIV 1/2 Assay , currently FDA-approved professional use distribute U.S. Clearview速 Complete HIV-1/2 Rapid Test . An Investigational Device Exemption obtain FDA allow contractor supply Sure Check速 HIV 1/2 Assay study participant since approve home use .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Rapid HIV Self-testing Among MSM ( eSTAMP )
DOC.detailed_description: The eSTAMP project evaluate use impact provide rapid HIV test use men sex men ( MSM ) recruit via internet . Data obtain study include use test , use , utility test identify HIV infection promote engagement HIV care . This inform policy guide optimal use rapid HIV test . This research project conduct four sequential part evaluate acceptability , use effectiveness rapid HIV test kit among MSM city high HIV prevalence . Each part independent provide information implement next part study . At end part , data evaluate . The finding guide implementation subsequent part study . Part 1 evaluate material , package instruction conduct self-testing activity . MSM recruit prior research study internet participate focus group in-depth interview Emory University Northwestern University . These activity take place Atlanta , GA Chicago , IL . Completed . Part 2 evaluate user proficiency participant perform rapid HIV test observation use instructional material develop previous part study . MSM participate prior research study consent future contact involvement additional study recruit Emory University . Participants conduct activity Emory University Atlanta , GA . Completed . Part 3 evaluate performance rapid HIV test propose study population real world setting . Participants recruit via internet direct research study site study activity . Participants ship study material ( one OraQuick In-home HIV test , one SureCheck HIV 1/2 Assay one dry blood spot ( DBS ) collection kit ) . Participants report rapid HIV test result online return DBS card laboratory HIV testing . Completed . Part 4 evaluate use effectiveness provide free rapid HIV test public health strategy increase test among MSM . We recruit 3200 participant report HIV negative unaware HIV status main trial . These participant randomly assign either intervention comparison condition complete baseline survey . An additional 150 MSM report HIV-positive recruit evaluate distribution rapid HIV test network partner . Comparison arm : After complete baseline survey , comparison arm participant receive welcome greeting HIV prevention information . The online information cover importance test , link AIDSVu resource locate HIV test service prevention information area . Comparison arm participant receive follow-up survey 3 , 6 , 9 12 month . After complete 12 month assessment , participant send performance kit consist 1 oral fluid HIV test kit ( OraQuick ) 1 finger-stick blood HIV test kit ( Sure Check ) DBS specimen collection kit return HIV test CDC laboratory . Intervention arm : After complete baseline survey , welcome kit 4 rapid HIV test ( 2 oral fluid test kit [ OraQuick ] 2 finger-stick blood test kit [ Sure Check ] send participant intervention arm use and/or give away . Intervention arm participant receive follow-up survey 3 , 6 , 9 12 month option order additional test kit 3 , 6 9 month replenish kit use distribute . After complete 12 month assessment , participant send performance kit consist 1 oral fluid HIV test kit ( OraQuick ) 1 finger-stick blood HIV test kit ( Sure Check ) DBS specimen collection kit return HIV test CDC laboratory . The men report HIV-positive assigned one-arm descriptive cohort . Participants group take baseline survey receive rapid HIV test kit ( OraQuick ) distribute person social sexual network ( secondary user ) . Men HIV-positive group complete short follow-up survey 3 month . Secondary user use test access study material referral information .
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion Part 4 randomize control trial : 1. male sex birth 2. currently identify sex male 3. able provide inform consent 4. least 18 year age 5. report HIVnegative unaware HIV status 6. resident United States Puerto Rico . 7. able read instruction complete study survey instrument English 8. report anal sex least one man past 12 month 9. valid email address , cell phone capable send receive text message , physical shipping address receive kit 10. never diagnose bleed disorder 11. part HIV vaccine trial 12. take antiretroviral medication HIV . The exclusion criterion Part 4 randomize control trial : 1. male sex birth 2. currently identify sex male 3. able provide inform consent 4. 18 year age 5. report HIVpositive 6. resident United States Puerto Rico . 7. able read instruction complete study survey instrument English 8. report anal sex least one man past 12 month 9. valid email address , cell phone capable send receive text message , physical shipping address receive kit 10. ever diagnose bleed disorder 11. part HIV vaccine trial 12. take antiretroviral medication HIV .
